name: Crème de Citrouille
description:
{nourishing pumpkin cream}

Lollique Crème de Citrouille is an ultra rich all over face & body crème that is made with 100% natural and organic Pumpkin Seed oil. This oil is known to have a high content of zinc, potassium, magnesium, omega 9, 6 and 3, and is packed with vitamins A (natural retinol), C, E K, beta-carotene, B2, B3 as well as a high content of essential fatty acids and minerals.  Pumpkin seed oil is a complex blend of fatty acids that helps repair dry, cracked, damaged skin.

This crème brings you amazing nutritious and skin firming properties. Mixed in highly nurturing oils of Jojoba, Avocado and Olive instantly relieves dryness, replenishes moisture and enhances your skins own moisture barrier.  It is particularly good for lifting and firming the skin (facial, abdominal, upper legs & breasts).  This cream will help re-texturize your skin for a younger, healthier looking skin the natural way. Use all over face and body. Absorbs quickly & never feels greasy. Apply just out of the shower while skin is still moist for even better penetration!

Available in natural scents: Tangerine, Rose and Lavender.

Use day or night.

Net Weight 7 oz. $52

Ingredients: Prunella vulgaris (Heal All)) infused water*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Persea gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Cucurbita pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil*#, Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil,* Capric Triglyceride (Coconut Oil*, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Glycerin*, palm stearic acid, allantoin, hydrolyzed oat protein, non-micronized zinc oxide, kaolin clay, vitamin E acetate, Oleoresin Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) extract*, caprylic acid (preservative), lauric acid (preservative), and caprylyl glycol (preservative). The preservative system used in this product is based on organic and naturally derived science and contain zero toxicity. It is approved by Whole Foods as a system that they accept in their products. *indicates organic materials used. #This product was cold, expeller pressed and is unrefined.
    
Country of Origin: Handcrafted in the USA
    
Materials Used: Handcrafted in small batches using all-natural and organic materials.
    
Skin Types: All skin types, especially dry, mature types.

name: Lollique Facial Trio
description:
Pure & Natural, this is the most amazing way to Tone, Soothe & Hydrate your skin!

Getting back to basics in skin care is what Lollique skin products are all about. Each product individually handcrafted with 100% natural ingredients with formulations unique only to Lollique Beauté formulas.

Pure & Natural, this is the most amazing way to Tone, Soothe & Hydrate your skin!

Getting back to basics in skin care is what Lollique skin products are all about. Each product individually handcrafted with 100% natural ingredients with formulations unique only to Lollique Beauté formulas.

This set contains the following lovely products, each customized to your own individual skin needs and choices:

1 Jar Masque de Miel {honey mask} 5.5 ounces

This product is uniquely handcrafted with all-natural and organic ingredients in small batches to ensure freshness. We use raw Manuka honey sourced from New Zealand’s remote, pollution free forests renowned for its unique health-maintaining effects. Other ingredients include, local raw honey (fair traded whenever available), Royal Jelly, Propolis and Calendula oil. 

In your choice of Calendula, Lavender, Pumpkin Seed or Rose Hip, these dried Botanical plants are used in each of the selections by gently crushing the wild flowers which are added into the honey blend.

1 bottle Polissant {face polish}  1.5 ounce

Our Ph balancing, all-natural, organic  Polissant contains natural, organic abrasives and Alpha Hydroxy Acids such as ground oatmeal, goats milk, coconut milk, buttermilk, honey and royal jelly (just to name a few!).  It has a natural, nutty and earthy scent from the natural ingredients. The pure ingredients exfoliate, soften, nourish and brighten. 

Available in original formula and Vegan formula (no dairy, we give you more coconut milk)

1 bottle of Hydrosol {facial flower water mist}  2 ounces w/ mister

Hydrosols and flower waters provide immediate hydration to the skin and leave it feeling refreshed and toned.  Also prepares skin to receive the benefits of serums and moisturizers. These organic and all-natural floral waters are produced from steam-distilling plant materials. Available in an a variety of organic botanical sprays. Also available with Lollique TONIQUE! 

At check out let us know what choice you would like for your honey mask and hydrosol so we can customize for you.

name: Crème Hydrante {hydrating cream}
description:
Blended with pure plant oils and butters, this rich mix of organic nutrients instantly relieves dryness, replenishes moisture and enhances your skins own moisture barrier. Made with natures lush healing oils of Jojoba,  Cocoa Butter, Avocado, Coconut, Argan, Meadowfoam, Sunflower, Vita E and Grapeseed known to help repair, soften & heal skin.  Provides all-day moisture that leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth.  Use all over face and body. Absorbs quickly & never feels greasy. 

Net Weight 7.0 oz.    
Net Weight 3.5 oz.   

Available in all-natural scents: Tangerine (our signature scent), Almond, Coconut, Lavender, and natural (earthy scent from the butters and oils).

name: Masque de Miel {honey mask}
description:
Honey is a natural antiseptic and used to soothe, hydrate and heal skin.  We use raw, organic honey then we add imported Manuka honey which  is sourced from New Zealand’s remote, pollution free forests and is renowned for its unique health-maintaining effects.  We then mix in Organic Royal Jelly and Propolis, organic botanica herbs such as Lavender, Rosehip and Calendula are crushed then added to honey to bring out the natural healing and nourishing properties. This mask leaves the skin feeling soft, hydrated and luxurious, (and it's a little addicting too!) Honey can also be used as a spot treatment for blemishes. Upon application, it melts into skin, immediately clarifying pores and diffusing its heavenly scent. You will see a difference in clarity and even skin tone after each use! 
 
Suitable for all skin types
 
Net Weight  5.50 oz. $38.00

Choose from the following Lollique Masques:
 
Honey & Lavender, Honey & Rosehip, Honey & Calendula

name: Polissant {face polish}
description: This Ph balancing, all-nature, organic cleanser contains no water, eliminating the need for preservatives-making it stand out as the star of Lollique's signature skin care line. Lollique Polissant uses ground oatmeal, goats milk, honey and royal jelly just to name a few. It has a natural, nutty and earthy scent from the natural ingredients. The pure ingredients cleanse, exfoliate, soften, nourish and regenerate skin cells leaving face radiantly clean, hydrated and polished. Use as an exfoliant, cleanser and mask.

name: Tonique {tonic}
description:
This all natural and organic facial tonic and toner cleanses, balances, detoxs, conditions and removes excess oils to prepare your skin like no other. The base of wild harvested Witch Hazel (no alcohol) and organic apple cider vinegar, herb extracts, distillates (hydrosols) such as Cornflower, Lemongrass, Aloe, Rose and Lavender and essential oils form a natural healthy cleansing and healing tonic for normal-combination, oily-problem skin and sensitive acne skin types. Leaves skin clean, smooth and radiant!

You would be amazed at how much apple cider vinegar can do for your skin! Just a few of its uses are as a skin toner, cider vinegar will increase blood circulation, provide antiseptic benefits which will cleanse your skin and provide that 'toned' feeling. It's also rich in alpha-hydroxy acids which help dissolve fatty deposits on the skin which appears as 'scales' or flaking skin giving your skin a smooth appearance.  As a bonus, it assists with lightening aging spots and will balance the pH of your skin! 

It's no wonder we add it to our formula!
 
Net Weight 4 oz  

Net Weight 2 oz

name: Tonique & Polissant Duo
description:
Lollique loves a good match!  These two are a love affair for your skin. 100% natural ingredients and hand crafted in small batches in Lollique's  beauty kitchen. 

Get Lollique Polissant & Tonique together as a set!  contains exfoliating ingredients such as ground oatmeal, goats milk, coconut milk, buttermilk, honey and royal jelly (just to name a few!).  It has a natural, nutty and earthy scent from the natural ingredients. The pure ingredients exfoliate, soften, nourish, brighten and regenerate skin cells leaving face radiantly clean, hydrated and polished.

{plus enjoy}

Tonique - This all-natural and organic facial tonic and toner cleanses, balances, detoxs, conditions and removes excess oils to prepare your skin like no other. The base of wild harvested Witch Hazel (no alcohol) and organic apple cider vinegar, herb extracts, distillates (hydrosols) such as Cornflower, Lemongrass, Aloe and Lavender and essential oils form a natural healthy cleansing and healing tonic for normal-combination, oily-problem skin and sensitive acne skin types. Leaves skin clean, smooth and radiant! 

Lollique products are always handcrafted in small batches to ensure freshness!

1.5 oz Polissant + 2 oz Tonique 34.00

2 oz Polissant + 4 oz Tonique $61.00

name: Crème Jeunesse {age prevention & repair}
description:
The same great Lollique signature Crème Hydratante formula but with additional ultra nourishing, anti-aging, cell regenerative, Collagen and Elastin boosting oils such as Rose Hip Seed, Seabuckthorn, Evening Primrose, Camelina and Carrot Seed. These oils provide high doses of Omegas, natural Retinol A, Vitamin C and full of antioxidants, carotenes and flavonoids to help promote a youthful appearance. Blended with highly penetrating oils of Coconut, Avocado, Jojoba, Sunflower and Grapeseed, which are known to help repair, soften & heal skin. This rich blend of organic nutrients instantly replenishes moisture, helps tone, balances skin, increases elasticity and helps diminish wrinkles and fine lines. Provides all-day moisture that leaves the skin feeling soft, silky and radiant. 

This cream can be used all over body and face, use liberally and often!

Net Weight 3.5 oz   

Net Weight 7 oz     

Available in all-natural scents: Lavender, Tangerine, Almond, Coconut and Natural (natural scents of oils and butters).

name: Huile Jeunesse (youthful oil)
description:
This lavish facial oil has a number of highly potent, nourishing, regenerative, Collagen and Elastin boosting oils. Rose Hip Seed, Sea Buckthorn, Evening Primrose, Camelina and Carrot Seed which provide high doses of Omegas 3, 6, 7 & 9, natural Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C and full of antioxidants, carotenes and flavonoids. Blended with highly absorbant moisturizing oils of Coconut, Avocado, Grapeseed and Jojoba leaving skin feeling and looking radiant! 

Net weight .5 ounces - $32.00

For full details of product please visit www.lollique.com or click on "back to site".

name: Crème + Huile {Renouvelle} Duet
description:
Carrot, Broccoli & Pumpkin 
(renewing and lifting cream + facial oil)

Because everything is better in threes, we are offering our Lollique trio blend of carrot root, broccoli and pumpkin seed oils in a rich, all-natural cream base. 

This special blend packs an amazing range of Provitamin A (natural retinol), vitamins C, E, K, and Beta Carotene. Fatty acids Omega-6,9 and 3, Zinc, potassium, magnesium, B2, B3. 

These luxurious oils are particularly good for lifting and firming the skin, stimulates circulation, helps boost skin's elasticity and protect against environmental damage. Nurturing and fast-absorbing, these oils are blended in Soybean, Rosehip Seed and Calendula oils and then blended in a rich Jojoba cream base. These oils are known to absorb fast, carrying all the essential nutrients deep into your skin. Apply it to damp skin to lock in moisture.

Excellent for all skin types, especially dry and mature.  Soothing  to irritated skin, also beneficial for eczema. Use all over body and face, day or night.

Net Weight 3.5 oz Crème + .50 oz Facial Oil - $ 60.00   
Net Weight 7.0 oz Crème + .50 oz Facial Oil - $85.00  


Tangerine, Almond, Coconut, Rose, Lavender, Natural (earthy).

name: Huile Renouvelle (renewing & lifting oil)
description:
Because everything is better in threes, we are offering our new Lollique trio blend of carrot root, broccoli and pumpkin seed oils. This blend offers an amazing range of Provitamin A, vitamins C, E, K, and Beta Carotene. Fatty acids Omega-6,9 and 3, Zinc, potassium, magnesium, beta-carotene, B2, B3. It is particularly good for lifting and firming the skin, stimulates circulation, helps boost skin's elasticity and protect against environmental damage. Nurturing and fast-absorbing, this oil is created with a blend of Soybean, Jojoba , Calendula, Rosehip Seed and Argan oils which are known to absorbe fast, carrying all the essential nutrients deep into your skin. Apply it to damp skin after bathing to lock in moisture. 

Ingredients: Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil (and) Daucus carota sativa (Carrot) Root Extract (and) Tocopherol (and) Brassica oleracea italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil (and) Cucurbita pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania spinosa (Argan) Oil, Rosa rubiginosa (Rosehip Seed) Oil, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Oil.  allantoin, Persea gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Capric Triglyceride (Coconut Oil), Vitis viniferal (Grapeseed Oil), glycerin (kosher grade), Tocopherol, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract

Excellent for ALL skin types, especially dry and mature.

Net weight .5 ounces - $32.00

name: Hydrosols & Misters (flower waters)
description:
Lollique offers a variety of high-quality organic hydrosols, Lavender, Rose, Lemongrass, Cornflower (L'eau de Bleuet) and Witchhazel.

Hydrosols provide immediate hydration to the skin and leave it feeling refreshed and toned.  Also prepares skin to receive the benefits of serums and moisturizers.

These organic floral waters are produced from steam-distilling plant materials. 

How to use: Close eyes and gently mist the face after cleansing. Follow with Lollique Face Oil.  Apply anytime throughout the day for a refreshing boost of hydration.

It is recommended to keep all Hydrosols and Essence waters refridgerated.

General Applications:

    Facial Toner
    Body Spray/Splash
    Makeup Remover
    Use to Replace Water in Moisturizers
    Use in Clay Facials and Masks
    Steams
    Compresses
    Wet Wipes
    Room Spray
    Linen Spray
    Clothing Spray


4 oz  Blue Cobalt Glass Bottle w/mister $17.00

2 oz Frosted white Glass bottle w/mister $10.50

(Rose Hydrosol is $19.00 for 4 oz and $12.50 for 2 oz)

description:
Lollique offers a variety of high-quality organic hydrosols, Lavender, Rose, Lemongrass, Cornflower (L'eau de Bleuet) and Witchhazel.

Hydrosols provide immediate hydration to the skin and leave it feeling refreshed and toned.  Also prepares skin to receive the benefits of serums and moisturisers.

name: Hydrating Dead Sea Mud Masque
description:
{facial and body masque}

Made with high quality Dead Sea Mud is imported from Israel. This mud is packed full of naturally occurring ancient minerals.  Dead Sea Mud, also known as Black Mud, is a high quality, mineral-rich mud used for centuries for its cosmetic and health benefits. A host of ingredients are added which are designed to pamper, tone, and soothe your skin. Dead Sea Mud Mask is abundantly rich in vitamins, minerals and trace elements that are oh-so-good for your dry, irritated skin. This Dead Sea Mud Mask is ideal for relieving skin problems all over face and body. After one application you will feel a difference. After one week of use, you will see a noticeable difference in skin tightness, and hydration.   If your skin is normal to dry, we recommend using this product at least three times per week.

How to Use: Unlike a clay masque that is applied and allow to dry, this masque should be applied and removed within about 5 minutes of application.  Since its designed as a hydration masque, you don't want it to fully set before washing off.  We include easy to follow directions with each purchase. 

Benefits:

    *Improving blood circulation and natural skin regeneration.
    *Cleansing the skin to remove dirt, impurities and toxins.
    *Relieving skin disorders such as psoriasis, eczema, acne and wrinkles.
    *Moisturizing your skin and helping natural skin hydration occur.
    *Gently peeling away dead skin cells to reveal a more youthful, healthier skin layer.

12 ounces $53.00 a favorite especially if doing body too!

6 ounces $27.00

1.5 ounces $14.00 (trial/travel size)

name: NEW! Coconut Body Exfoliating Scrubs
description:
The results from Body Scrubs can be dramatic. When you remove old and dead skin cells from the body you allow trapped dirt and bacteria to be removed leaving your with new, glowing skin.

This is the perfect product to prime your skin for self-tanning!
Scrubs are primarily used to exfoliate dead skin cellsm  aid in circulation and the rejuvenation of your skin. The abrasive action are to fight aging by opening the pores and allowing them to breathe. Results can be dramatic and visible after first treatment.

Lollique's unique formula goes one step further then the rest by adding soothing and hydrating ingredients suchg as natural Coconut flakes, coconut powder, colloidal oatmeal, goats milk powder* and honey gradules. We then mix in organic oils such as Jojoba, Coconut, Avocado, Grapeseed, Almond, Sunflower, Saflower, Vitamin E which are known to hydrate and soothe dry skin.

*Goats Milk contains Lactic Acid which is known to help exfoliate and slough away dead skin leaving your skin more radiant.

Scrubs are availale in Dead Sea Salt or Organic Brown Sugar

Scents available in Coconut-Lime and Coconut-Orange

11 oz $25.00

name: Sels de Bain (bath salts)
description:
This is an all-natural, high mineral detox bath soak is mixed with skin softening organic dried goats milk, coconut milk, oatmeal and honey along with skin quenching oils. We mix jojoba oil into the salt, then crush organic flowers into the salts to bring out their natural essential oils! (this is truly exquisite). This bath soak will draw out toxins, heal bruises, aches and pains, skin irritations and soothe and hydrate your skin. Promotes healthy circulation as well. One cup of our mineral-rich Mediterranean Sea Salts in your steaming bath. You will emerge from your fragrant soak relaxed and rejuvenated. Keep out of eyes. 100% Natural ingredients used.

3 packets of 4 ounces each (each perfectly measured for your bath time) $18.00 

Available in Orange Lavender and Orange Calendula

Base Ingredients: Dead Sea Salts, Epson Salt, Hymalayan Salt (Magnesium, Potasium, Sodium and Calcium Chlorides, Bromide, Sulphates and numerous trace minerals), Avena Sativa* (Oats), Goat Milk Powder*, Dry Milk, Maltodextrin and Milk Protein* (Dehydrated Coconut Milk), Honey powder, Honey Gradules, Calendula officinalis (Calendula) powder*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Capric Triglyceride (Coconut) Oil*, Glycine Soya (Soybean) Oil* Calendula officinalis oil (and) Tocopherol, Citrus sinensis (orange peel)*. *denotes certified organic materials were used

Lavender: Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Lavandula*Angustifolia (French Lavender) flower
Calendula:  Calendula officinalis (Flower) *

name: NEW! Lipstique Couleur
description:
Tinted Lip Treatment & Repair

This all-natural lip treatment is made with organic, natural beeswax, oils and butters that will leave your lips quenched and hydrated. Exceptionally healing too! Apply liberally on lips. Leaves a nice natural hint of color and sheen on lips. Very soft, satin like feeling on lips. Handcrafted with100% Natural. ingredients  We only use mineral mica pigments which are lip and cosmetic safe. 

5 shades + 1 lip balm $30.00

Choice of natural tints include 
•Rouge Flambé
•Pink Glimmer
•Tangerine Dream
•Bordeaux Lustre
•First Date Pink
•Frankly Scarlet Red
•Sunday Afternoon

(set will include 5 of these shades as they are available).

Note:  We are going to be fun and adventurous with this new Lollique product by changing up the colors as we go.  Because we make everything in small batches, we cannot guarantee that we will be able to offer a tint exactly the same again. As we run out, we will introduce other tints and rotate them around. Hint.. if you like a certain color get it while you can!

Ingredients: Beeswax, Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Coconut) Oil, Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Rubu Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil), Vitis vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil), Glycerine, Tocopherol (vitamin E). May contain these natural tints: Mica and Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide and Carmine

name: Ultimate "Spoil Yourself" Facial & Body Set
description:
A wonderful and luxurious complete facial and body set for the ultimate pampering!

This body and facial polishing set will leave your skin exfoliated, hydrated, polished and glowing! Body Scrub and Bath salts are made with Hymalayan pink salts, Mediterranean dead sea salts, epson salt and organic brown sugar.  We then add luxurious oils such as Olive, Jojoba, Coconut, Avocado, Sunflower and Calendula to soften and hydrate! We also crush organic lavender buds and dried calendula petals for their exquisite essential oil and fragrance.
